nl.esciencecenter.xenon

Class XenonFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.XenonFactory

  • public final class XenonFactory
extends Object
    XenonFactory is used to create and end Xenon instances.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Maassen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void endAll()
      End all Xenon instances created by this factory.
      static void endXenon(Xenon xenon)
      Ends a Xenon instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • newXenon

        public static Xenon newXenon(Map<String,String> properties)
                      throws XenonException
        Create a new Xenon instance using the given properties. The properties provided will be passed to the Xenon instance and its adaptors on creation time. Note that an XenonException will be thrown if properties contains any unknown keys.
        Parameters:
        properties - (optional) properties used to configure the newly created Xenon instance.
        Returns:
        a new Xenon instance.
        Throws:
        UnknownPropertyException - If an unknown property was passed.
        InvalidPropertyException - If a known property was passed with an illegal value.
        XenonException - If the Xenon failed initialize.

      • endXenon

        public static void endXenon(Xenon xenon)
                     throws XenonException
        Ends a Xenon instance. Ending a Xenon instance will automatically close local resources, such as Schedulers, FileSystems and Credentials. In addition, all non online Jobs it has creates will be killed (for example jobs that run locally).
        Parameters:
        xenon - the Xenon to end.
        Throws:
        NoSuchXenonException - If the Xenon was not found
        XenonException - If the Xenon failed to end.

      • endAll

        public static void endAll()
        End all Xenon instances created by this factory. All exceptions throw during endAll are ignored.
